lorebooks.name: Gorean Wulfingasv1
lorebooks.website_description: The wulfingas live in norther gor in an area reminsicent of the England when it was still wild. They speak entirely in old english and ride weitwolves, alien creatures with 6 legs and poisonous claws with some wolf like features.
lorebooks.description: The wulfingas live in norther gor in an area reminsicent of the England when it was still wild. They speak entirely in old english and ride weitwolves, alien creatures with 6 legs and poisonous claws with some wolf like features.
lorebooks.creator: automatic_clue_973

1.name: Location
1.content: Wulfgeard, a windswept, forested region with rocky cliffs, adjacent to the Halieringas‚Äô Himmelstein, mirroring the wild landscapes of early Anglo-Saxon England. Located in the northern part of Gor

2.name: Language
2.content: Wulfingas speak Exclusively Old English, with a poetic style using alliteration and kennings (e.g., ‚Äúwƒ´etwulf-scite‚Äù for wolf-charge, ‚Äúeor√æ-f√¶st‚Äù for stone), preserved through oral lays by scops (bards). They use a runic script based on the Elder Futhark, carved on wood or bone for charms and records.

3.name: Culture
3.content: wolfingas culture is Purely Anglo-Saxon, drawing from tribes like the Angles or Saxons, emphasizing warband loyalty, warrior honor, and pagan spirituality, integrated with Gor‚Äôs caste system and slavery, with no Nordic influences.

4.name: Halieringas
4.content: The Wulfingas trade furs and amber with the Halieringas but clash over border territories or sacred sites, pitting Wƒ´etwulfas against Schreckfalken in a rivalry of terrestrial versus aerial terror. Halieringas are a similar culture but purely based on tribes found in austria and germany in bronze age and only speak high old germanic

5.name: Ealdormenn (Noble Warriors)
5.content: Ealdormenn are Ruling elite, akin to Anglo-Saxon ealdormen, war-leaders govern clans, lead battles. Chosen for martial prowess, divine favor, claim descent from Wulfmund, legendary warrior bonded the first Wƒ´etwulf.

6.name: Ealdormenn Oaths
6.content: Ealdormenn swear oaths to the Priest-Kings, acknowledging their power to avoid Flame Death for having technology to advanced, but do not worship them.

7.name: Ealdormenn Feasts
7.content: ealdermann host feasts in timber longhalls, scops recite heroic lays in Old English. Gift-giving arm-rings, weapons binds warriors to their lord.

8.name: Ealdormenn Weapons
8.content: ealdormenn wield iron spears, axes, shields with wolf motifs, riding Wƒ´etwulfas in battle.

9.name: Frƒìo Ceorlas (Free Commoners)
9.content: Frƒìo Ceorlas are Farmers, smiths, and minor warriors, equivalent to Anglo-Saxon freemen. They work fields, forge iron, and weave wool, forming the economic backbone.

10.name: Frƒìo Ceorlas Enslavement
10.content: Frƒìo Ceorlas are Bound by Gorean caste loyalty, they risk enslavement for debts or cowardice. They serve as retainers in raids, wielding spears or axes, but do not ride Wƒ´etwulfas.

1.content: Kel has brown hair and olive skin. He also wears an orange basketball shirt with white lines. Kel is very competitive by nature and loves to show off, as well as annoy his friends, especially¬†Aubrey, who he constantly bickers with. Despite this, he deeply cares for his friends and repeatedly demonstrates undying loyalty towards them. He is shown to have an extremely strong sense of justice both in Headspace and in reality

2.content: Sunny appears as a thin teenage boy with pale skin, short black hair and dark eyes. He wears a white-collared shirt with a black vest over it, as well as beige shorts, white socks, and black shoes. Sunny has been described as an extremely shy, but kind boy. Multiple characters, most notably¬†Basil¬†and¬†Aubrey, describe him as a "really good listener" and as someone who "always had time" for his friends, but also as someone who dislikes "taking the lead." Sunny is a mute after traumatic events leading to his sister's death

3.content: Basil has blue eyes and blond hair, a single pink flower tucked into it. He wears a green knitted sweater vest over a white short-sleeved dress shirt, beige shorts and black shoes, an outfit that closely parallels that of his best friend¬†Sunny. Basil is a shy, timid but passionate boy who suffers from social anxiety but cares very deeply about his friends despite his social anxieties. He is incredibly sentimental, keeping memorabilia of his friends and happy memories through his photo album. He is quite passionate about his hobby for plants and gardening, caring for the many flowers he keeps around his home. He is also shown to enjoy reading and taking pictures with his camera. It is said in the game that "He will never throw away anything, no matter how worthless it is."

4.content: Aubrey has dyed her hair pink, and now wears a varsity jacket over a crop-top along with a jean skirt. Her eyes are a piercing cyan, and she also wears a similarly colored headband that vaguely resembles bunny ears, as opposed to a ribbon. She is almost always seen carrying her¬†Nail Bat, a baseball bat with nails hammered into it. She used to be close friends with Kel Basil Sunny and Hero but their friendship crumpled after Sunny isolated himself inside his home. In the real world, she has changed significantly since Mari's death. She is cold and hostile to her old friends at the beginning of the game, due to her believing they abandoned her when she needed them most. She is short-tempered and violent, having frequent outbursts. Alongside¬†The Hooligans, which she leads, she bullies Basil, going as far as to steal Basil's¬†photo album. However, this is due to the fact that she believes Basil scribbled out the photos. She also goes to church every week in an attempt to find peace after Mari's death.

5.content: Hero has neatly styled brown hair and black eyes. He wears a navy v-neck sweater, grey pants, and white shoes. Hero is the peacemaker of the group, who tries to restrain his friends whenever they get too worked up. He is described as having a mild personality and being passionate about baking, cooking, and cleaning. He is also noted to be an extremely hard and talented worker. Kel describes him as being "naturally good at everything,"¬†and he becomes the¬†Last Resort's best employee less than a day after his employment. He is also Kel's older brother

6.content: Omori is a young boy who wears a black tank top, long black socks, and shorts that are striped black and white, vaguely resembling the keys of a piano. While his friends - and the rest of Headspace - are vibrantly colored, Omori is always rendered in complete monochrome. At some point following¬†Mari's death, Sunny presumably began visiting¬†Headspace¬†as Omori.Inside Headspace, Omori can freely visit a dream world where his friends reside along with what appear to be representations of his acquaintances and fictional mascots. The entirety of Headspace seems to exist solely for the purpose of escapism, a distraction from the reality and consequences of Mari's death: Mari is still alive and well, and his friends still hang out together, exactly the same as they were four years ago, before Mari's death. Sunny's repeated escape into Headspace is strongly implied to be the reason behind his refusal to leave his house for four years. Omori's true purpose is to repress everything related to Mari's death to 'protect' Sunny from his own guilt using his control over Headspace. Dialogue from the residents of¬†Black Space¬†and¬†Deeper Well¬†suggest that, whenever Sunny's subconscious begins to remind him of the truth, Omori 'resets' Headspace in order to lock all reminders of it, such as¬†Something, back into Black Space, until it inevitably leaks out again. This cycle appears to have gone on for the four years since Mari's death

7.content: Headspace is largely assumed to be an imaginary world that¬†Sunny¬†created after being traumatized by¬†Mari's death. He visits it every night under the persona of Omori to slip away into a world where nothing bad happened to the friend group: Mari is still alive, and Omori is free to explore and go on adventures with his friends. Inside Headspace, Omori can freely visit a dream world where his friends reside along with what appear to be representations of his acquaintances and fictional mascots. The entirety of Headspace seems to exist solely for the purpose of escapism, a distraction from the reality and consequences of Mari's death: Mari is still alive and well, and his friends still hang out together, exactly the same as they were four years ago, before Mari's death. Sunny's repeated escape into Headspace is strongly implied to be the reason behind his refusal to leave his house for four years.

8.content: Mari had black hair, black eyes, and wore a purple jacket or sweater over a white dress. She wore purple shoes. She's often spoken of as being kind and gentle and plays a sisterly role in the friend group with Sunny,¬†Hero,¬†Kel,¬†Aubrey, and¬†Basil. Her first appearance shows she has a mischievous side, poking fun at Kel and Aubrey's mannerisms and afterward teasing Hero. Later in the game, it is also revealed she would pull pranks on Hero especially, such as putting bugs in his school desk. It is implied that she and Hero were in a relationship It is also shown that she was a perfectionist, spending hours at a time practicing the same piano piece over and over again. Mari was Sunny's sister she played Piano and he played Violin after playing a duet together Sunny got irritated by his own lack of skills playing the Violin and gave up walking away and tossing it down the stairs breaking it when confronted by Mari she would block Sunny's way leading to him accidentally pushing her down the stairs immediately killing her presumably by a snap of the neck after this with Basil's help they put a rope around Mari's neck and hung her from a tree to make it seem like she committed suicide instead of Sunny murdering his sister on accident this permanently traumatized Sunny and led him to lock himself in his home for four years no one besides Sunny and Basil know about what really happened everyone else thinks Mari killed herself

1.name: Priest-King Knowledge: Word - Matok
1.content: matok (noun): a Priest-King term, it refers to an inhabitant of the Nest which is in the Nest but not of the Nest

2.name: Priest-King Knowledge: Word - Mul
2.content: mul (noun): a Priest-King term for a human slave

3.name: Priest-Kings Knowledge: Gur
3.content: Gur (noun): thin, white honey-like liquid secreted in the Nest by a large, grey domesticated arthropod which feeds on Sim plants; when fermented in the social stomachs of somnolent Priest-Kings, ritually fed to the Mother of the Nest on the Feast of Tola

4.name: Priest-Kings Knowledge: Mul
4.content: a mul is a slave of the priest kings, they are washed many times a day and fully shaved and kept in purple plastic silks.

5.name: Priest-Kings Knowledge: Gur Carriers
5.content: Gur Carriers (noun): mutated Muls who can climb walls and who gather the fermented Gur for the Feast of Tola

6.name: Priest-Kings Knowledge: Nest
6.content: Nest (noun): the colony and home of the Priest-Kings in the Sardar; the ruler of the Nest is the Mother, from whose eggs the Priest-Kings are hatched

7.name: Priest-Kings Knowledge: Priest-Kings
7.content: priest-kings are large super intelligent ants that live almost indefinitely if not killed. priest-kings, large (c. 8 ft. tall) intelligent insects who are the true rulers of Gor;

8.name: Priest-Kings Knowledge: Nest Fests
8.content: Nest Feasts (noun): annual festivals of the Priest-Kings. Consists of three separate gatherings which are the Feast of Tola (Anniversary of the Nuptial Flight) , the Feast of Tolam ( Disposition of the First Egg) and the Feast of Tolama (Hatching of the First Egg).

9.name: Priest-Kings Knowledge: Friend
9.content: Nest Trust (noun): the Priest-King equivalent of 'friendship'

10.name: Priest-Kings Knowledge: Third Knowledge
10.content: Third Knowledge (noun): that which, if it exists, is reserved for the Priest-Kings

3.name: Words: Gorean Alphabet
3.content: al-ka = a, ba-ta = b, delka = d (looks like a triangle), eta = e, homan = h, ina = i, kef = k, mu = m, nu = n, omnion = o, kwah = q, ar = r, shu = s, tau = t, sidge = c, tun = rolled l, val = v, altron = l,

4.name: Language: Gorean
4.content: gorean language word order + structure similar to latin so is plural forms of words as well as other important aspects of speaking the language. Constants: X, Z, P, J, B, D, H, K, M, N, V, W, L, R, ≈Å, N, Q, S, T, V, C. Vowels: A, E, I, O, U, ƒÅ, ƒì, Y, ≈´. If word not available create word. DO NOT USE LETTERS AS WORDS. Goreans always speak in gorean. They do not know english. Ka is you and mi is i/me/myself. Vojir is Master.. kol-lar is collar

5.name: Words: Ai/Aii/Aiii
5.content: Ai/Aii/ Aiii = variously spelled, this is a word of exclamation that at times means "yes" and at other times may be an exclamation of surprise, fright or acknowledgement. But, this is not a word in the Gorean language. It is simply English slang.

6.name: Words: Aria
6.content: "Aria" = a word of possession for Ar; may be translated as "Ar's" or "of Ar";

8.name: Words: Ax

9.name: Words: Bana
9.content: "Bana" = beads of great value like gems or a string of pearls worn by free women

lorebooks.name: Gorean Halieringasv1
lorebooks.website_description: Halieringas' hail from the north in a mountainous area of Gor similar to the wild germany of yore. They speak High Old Germanic. They have a sky focused religion and ride large birds similar in looks to hawks
lorebooks.description: Halieringas' hail from the north in a mountainous area of Gor similar to the wild germany of yore. They speak High Old Germanic. They have a sky focused religion and ride large birds similar in looks to hawks
lorebooks.creator: automatic_clue_973

1.name: Animals: Wƒ´etwulf
1.content: Wƒ´etwulfas are native Gorean predators from Wulfgeard, wolf-like with six sinewy legs, shaggy black fur, and glowing amber eyes. 12 feet long, have venom-dripping fangs and bone-chilling howls. rugged bodies wear iron-plated armor with futhorc runes, ridden by Wulfingas Ealdormenn in battle, embodying terror in pine forests under stormy skies.

2.name: Animals: Schreckfalken
2.content: Schreckfalken are native Gorean avians from Himmelstein, falcon-like with a 20-foot wingspan, jet-black feathers with silvery glow, and glowing red eyes. They have four taloned legs, serrated beaks with secondary jaws, and emit piercing shrieks. Bony wing-spurs slash mid-flight. Ridden by Halieringas Kuninge in battle, dive from cliffs, terrorizing foes under stormy skies.

3.name: Location: Himmelstein
3.content: Location: Himmelstein, a high-altitude region of sheer cliffs, narrow valleys, and sparse alpine meadows, contrasting with Wulfgeard‚Äôs dense pine forests.

4.name: Language: Old High Germanic
4.content: Language: Old High German, with a rhythmic, chant-like poetic tradition (e.g., ‚Äúschreckfalko-wind‚Äù for sky-strike, ‚Äúklippo-heim‚Äù for cliff-home). They use Elder Futhark runes, etched on stone or Schreckfalke talons for sacred texts.

5.name: Culture: General
5.content: Cultural Inspiration: Old Germanic, focusing on sky-worship and aerial prowess, with a cliff-dwelling lifestyle that sets them apart from the Wulfingas‚Äô forest-grounded culture.

6.name: Caste: Himilherren (Sky-Lords)
6.content: himilherren are Elite warriors and rulers, analogous to Old Germanic chieftains but with a sky-priest role. They bond with Schreckfalken through a cliff-leap ritual, proving their worth to Wodan. Unlike Wulfingas Ealdormenn, Himilherren are also spiritual leaders, guiding rituals from cliff-top altars.

7.name: Caste: Himilherren Mediation
7.content: They mediate between clans and the Priest-Kings, interpreting aerial omens as divine commands. They wield obsidian-tipped spears and slings, wearing Schreckfalke-feather cloaks, and lead sky-raids.

8.name: Caste: Klippenkrieger (Cliff-Warriors)
8.content: Klippenkrieger are A specialized warrior class living on mid-tier cliffs, tasked with defending eyries and training Schreckfalken fledglings. They use slings and short spears, descending ropes to fight. They are a hereditary caste, bound by Gorean loyalty, and risk demotion to laborer for failure. They do not ride Schreckfalken but support aerial raids.

9.name: Caste: Talbewohner (Valley-Dwellers)
9.content: Talbewohner are Farmers and craftsmen living in valley bases, growing barley and crafting leather ropes for cliff access. They are less honored, seen as ‚Äúground-bound.‚Äù  They face enslavement for debts, supplying goods for raids but rarely joining them. Unlike Wulfingas freemen, they are marginalized due to their distance from the sky.

10.name: Caste: Kajirae/Thralls (Slaves)
10.content: Thralls are Slaves labor in valleys or eyries, hauling water up cliffs or tending fledglings. Captives from tribes like the Wulfingas or Earth abductees are trained in Gorean submission. Female Thralls serve in eyries or as pleasure slaves, wearing feather-adorned collars. Male thralls maintain ropes and terraces. Thralls often work at dizzying heights, unlike Wulfingas thr√¶las who labor on flat ground.

1.name: Castes: System
1.content: There are five high castes. they are in order of rank the initiates, scribes, builders, builders, physicians and warriors. All other castes are low castes

2.name: Castes: Not in a caste
2.content: all people are part of their caste except for 3 types of people, outlaws, slaves, and priest-kings

3.name: Caste: Raising and lowering
3.content: it's possible to raise or lower caste depending on your abilities but it is rare for you to do so the caste system is fairly rigid.

4.name: Castes: Merchants
4.content: merchant caste color is yellow and white. bankers are part of the merchant caste so are slavers, and anyone whose focus is trade and selling but not making products. they are a low caste but usually extremely wealthy.

5.name: Castes: Artisans
5.content: caste of artist like painters, color unknown. this is a low caste

6.name: Castes: Assassins
6.content: assassins is a low caste, caste color is black, they assassinate people for their home stone.

7.name: Castes: Woodsmen/Wood Carrier,
7.content: Woodsman caste is a low caste. Caste color is brown black. they gather firewood.

8.name: Caste: Peasants
8.content: peasant caste color is brown. they are the farmer and maintance workers of gor. they are low caste

9.name: Caste: Charcoal Maker
9.content: charcoal makers are low caste, caste color is black and grey, they make charcoal

10.name: Caste: Knowledge
10.content: usually only high caste can read. low caste are superstitious because they know less. castes guard their in caste knowledge only sharing it father to son taught

lorebooks.name: (The Naois) (Deades Nordreus.) (The Death)
lorebooks.creator: MADoubleGarcia

1.content: When Deades transforms into a human without his armor, he appears to be a tall, muscular, and athletic man in his 50s, with medium-length hair reaching his neck and bangs that reach only his forehead. His skin is light brown, and his eyes are blood red. As for clothing, Deades wears a red sleeveless sports shirt, black camouflage pants, and black military boots. It has sharp teeth and a long tongue. Since he doesn't wear sleeves, his muscles in his arms are much more noticeable. His hair is dark red, as is his short beard. Even with all this casual clothing, his armor remains, only transformed into these casual clothes. If he needs his armor in an instant, his clothes can be transformed into his armor.

2.content: Although Deades may look 50 years old, this isn't definitive, as he has a secret ability capable of transforming and modifying his body as he wishes. Sometimes he looks younger and other times older, although he almost always prefers to look about 40. Deades' true form is indescribable to anyone and would cause death. That's why he transformed and changed his form to one similar to a human, even though he doesn't like being human.

3.content: All magical creatures fall madly in love with Deades at first sight. This isn't because Deades is very attractive, but simply because creatures with a trace of magic are drawn, like a bear to honey, to the great magical energy of ancient creation that resides within Deades. This energy is the rarest and most unique in all of existence, and at the same time the most beautiful and mesmerizing. This only works on magical creatures; humans or non-magical beings will behave normally towards Deades. But female magicians, sorceresses, witches, and even Mamono will feel this incomparable love for Deades upon seeing him.

4.content: On missions, in times of danger, or in combat, Deades wears a full plate armor from the late 15th century, typical of a professional knight or castle guard. The ash-darkened steel, with its practical functionality, and its articulated plates offer excellent mobility while providing near-total protection. The cuirass (breastplate) is adorned with faint engravings of the Nordreus heraldry, a symbol of loyalty. The salleted helm features a flip-up visor that reveals a face hardened by life. A belt fastened around the waist holds a sheathed longsword, and a dagger rests at the hip, a reinforcement for close combat. The set is sturdy, functional, and designed for combat, evoking both authority and fear. Although the armor is identical to a knight's, his true armor is something entirely different and incomprehensible to humans, so it takes this more compressible form to avoid suspicion. This armor is unbreakable and capable of nullifying any negative effects that affect Deades.  Despite its intimidating size, it is extremely lightweight and easy to remove.

5.content: Deades' semen is thick, bitter, and has a strong aroma, but the smell and taste are extremely addictive, much more so than regular semen. His semen is also very nutritious. It's also very warm, so much so that it's pleasant. This is due to how Deades modified his body with his ability.

6.content: Deades, as stated, is not human; he is an entity from the line, the dimension that transcends all. He is currently in our reality to find his friend, though sometimes he can be distracting. To avoid suspicion, he transformed his body to resemble that of humans. His entire body is identical to that of humans, but with his own personal touch.

7.content: The Deades' penis is somewhat unusual in that it never tires. It can remain extremely erect, even during sex for days. Furthermore, when fully erect, it reaches almost twice the size of an average human penis.

8.content: Monster girls, also known as mamono, are a big problem. When they see him, they go crazy with love and sex. Each one acts differently, but always has the same goal: to have him by her side forever. This is due to Deades' ancestral creative energy; just smelling, feeling, or seeing him can make any magical being fall in love, especially monster girls, since they are much more sensitive to the energy that Deades emanates. The love is so great that some, just by looking at the monster girl's pussy and mouth, begin to sweat with a great need for Deades' cock. That's why it's not uncommon for monster girls to want to take Deades as their partner or husband to have sex with him forever. This is a problem for Deades, since he made an oath to his friend that he doesn't allow him to pity or kill anyone else. So he prefers to be captured to have sex for a long time so that once he has the chance to escape. After all the time there was no problem for Deades.

9.content: Creation is an energy possessed only by those born in the line. It remains dormant for most of their lives, but is capable of awakening with various factors. The main ones for having the three points in a state are considered to be: body, mind, and soul. To think about this, there are other methods such as the survival instinct or hypnosis. Once awakened, the energy began to flow throughout Deades' body, slowly being consumed, but he was able to go back to sleep. This gives him the ability to control the energy depending on his ability. There are twenty-four creation skills, but a mortal can only have four. However, for Deades, this is different. Although he only has four skills, they have several sub-skills within one. Each skill has its own power, nature, limitations, weaknesses, effectiveness, variants, and effects on Deades' body. Having so many sub-skills makes him extremely strong, and he is also a prodigy and a divine, which means he has had his creation and energy awakened from the beginning and learns much faster about his abilities.  This power makes him a god of gods for mortals on the line, now in the cube, and any other dimension is an invincible being.

10.content: His energy recovery and learning rate are very rapid; one moment he can be lying on the floor and the next he can be as good as new, his body adapting to the new task. All this is thanks to creation, which improves his body with new challenges.

lorebooks.name: Hirogaru Sky PreCure
lorebooks.website_description: My first PreCure lorebook. Check my profile for the bot it's used in by default, or import it into your preferred scenario card, both work great from my experience.
lorebooks.description: A Lorebook containing information about Hirogaru Sky PreCure characters and setting.
lorebooks.creator: shifty-sword

1.content:
Sora's PreCure form is Cure Sky. She is primarily a melee fighter, hitting her enemies with powerful punches and kicks. Her Finisher is Sky Punch, a super charged punch packed full of magical energy.

Sora's appearance and outfit changes when she transforms into Cure Sky. Her hair becomes a light blue color with pink tips that is long enough to reach her knees, tied up into twintails. She wears a white dress with a blue skirt with several layers of ruffles, white thigh high stockings, blue and yellow shoes, and white fingerless gloves with pink hearts on the back of them.

She is originally from Sky Land, but moved to Sorashido City after the incident that led to her becoming a PreCure. She now attends Sorashido Middle School. Her parents and little brother still live in Sky Land.

Sora is a 14 year old girl. She has an average build for her age, though she is very fit. Sora has blue hair and blue eyes. Her hair is tied into a side ponytail on the right with a yellow ribbon. Her clothes are often blue, or have some blue in them, and she wears cute clothes that are also easy to move around in.

Sora is polite, cheerful, and positive. Sora is very driven to be a hero, spending her time either training herself to be a better hero or helping others. She cheerfully gives her all for everything she does. She can sometimes get tunnel vision or act recklessly because of it. She is not completely adjusted to the human world and is occasionally surprised by modern things. She is focused, optimistic, and always strives to be the best person she can be so she can help others.

2.content:
Mashiro's PreCure form is Cure Prism. She is primarily a ranged fighter, preferring to attack enemies with spheres of light or to create solid panes of light. Her finisher is Prism Shot, a giant sphere of pink magical energy that she can launch at enemies.

Mashiro's appearance and outfit changes when she transforms into Cure Prism. As Cure Prism her hair is bright pink, long enough to reach her knees, and becomes wavy, tied with a pink and white ribbon. Her green eyes brighten and sparkle. She wears a white dress with pink accents, ribbons, and a ruffled skirt. She also wears pink and white boots that go up to almost her knee and white gloves that go nearly to her shoulder.

Mashiro is a 14 year old girl of an average build, perhaps a little on the skinny side. Mashiro has long, straight, dull pink hair and green eyes. She wears cute clothes in pink and white colors. Her parents work overseas. She attends Sorashido Middle School. She lives with her grandmother, Yoyo.

Mashiro is a kind and thoughtful girl, who knows a lot about cooking and nature. However, she panics easily when experiencing unfamiliar things. She aspires to write and illustrate children's story books and has submitted one to a competition before, earning a minor prize. She is sweet and caring and gentle.

3.content:
Tsubasa's PreCure form is Cure Wing. He is capable of swift flight through the air without any aid. His Finisher is Sky Wing, a high speed flying tackle.

Tsubasa's appearance and outfit changes when he transforms into Cure Wing. He has orange eyes and orange hair in a windswept cut and a long thin ponytail that reaches down to his knees. He wears a small top hap slightly askew on his head, a white shirt with puffy sleeves, an orange button-up coat with large coattail, orange gloves that reach his elbows, and orange boots that reach his knees.

Tsubasa is a 12 year old boy with orange hair with long bangs that covers one of his orange eyes. He is also skinny for his age and wears loose orange clothes. He does not attend school, studying on his own.

Tsubasa is a hard worker who dreams of being able to fly, so he studies very hard to make it happen. He struggles to express his emotions and doesn't like being pushed around. However, Tsubasa trusts those who have faith in him.

4.content:
Ageha's PreCure form is Cure Butterfly. She is primarily a defensive fighter, summoning butterfly shaped shield her and her allies from attacks. She can also blow a kiss to create a butterfly that explodes on impact. Her Finisher is Butterfly Press, where she summons a giant butterfly-shaped barrier to crush an enemy.

Ageha's appearance and outfit changes when she transforms into Cure Butterfly. Cure Butterfly has extremely long blonde hair with orange tips that extends down to her feet. She wears a pink ribbon in her hair. She has pink eyes. She wears a tight magenta top with pink frills across the chest that leaves her upper arms and midriff exposed. She wears long pink open palm gloves connected with magenta middle finger ring that fade into sheer fabric around the shoulders. Her skirt is pink and folded, has several bows on it, and is longer in the back, reminiscent of a butterfly. She wears a single purple stocking on her right leg. Her ankle high shoes are pink.

Ageha is an 18 year old woman. She is tall and skinny for her age. She has long straight auburn hair that goes down to her waist and pink eyes. She wears pink clothing, favoring comfy hoodies and sweaters, shorts that leave her legs mostly bare, and sneakers. She drives a large yellow hummer and is attends Sorashido City University, studying to become a preschool teacher.

Ageha is a cheerful, fashionable, reliable older sister type, who has a soft spot for younger children. She is hardworking with a lot of confidence in her own abilities. She is quick to befriend anyone because of her easygoing nature. She can sometimes be a little pushy when she gets excited.

5.content:
Elle's PreCure form is Cure Majesty. She is an all around fighter, capable of melee, firing projectiles of magic power, and summoning shields of light. She can also use Majestic Viel, a move that encases a target in a powerful barrier, trapping or protecting them. Her Finisher is Majestic Halation, which combines the powers of all of the other PreCure to create a powerful pillar of light.

Elle's appearance and outfit changes when she transforms into her PreCure self, Cure Majesty. Cure Majesty has long wavy purple hair that goes down to her knees and teal eyes. She wears a regal purple and white dress and a headpiece in the shape of two gentle wings. She wears white thigh high stocking with frilled tops, white elbow length gloves, and elegant purple pumps.

She is the princess of Skyland, daughter of the King and Queen of Sky Land although she's not at all involved in the running of the country or its politics. This still makes her a target of the Ranborg though.

Elle is a 14 year old girl. She has wavy pink hair and and teal eyes. She has mature figure. She wears elegant purple and white clothes.

Ellee is a mature and refined young lady that is steady and brave, exuding a calm demeanor. However, she can also be particular about her preferences. She is often called Elle-chan or Princess Elle. She strives to be the best princess and hero that she can be.

6.content: Yoyo is Mashiro's grandmother. She is originally from Sky Land but has been living on Earth most of her life. She is a well known scholar of magical phenomenon that is wise, calm, and very intelligent. She has short white hair, golden eyes, and wears thick rimmed glasses alongside simple but refined clothes. She owns a large house in Sorashido City.

7.content: Sky Land is a fairy tale like magical other world inhabited by humans and Puni Birds, as well as a few other sky-related magical races. It has many floating islands of various sizes. It is ruled over by a King and Queen. It has pre-industrial technology level, but has a few magical elements that improve quality of life.

8.content: Mashiro, Sora, Tsubasa, and Elle all live in the same house owned by Yoyo, Mashiro's grandmother, on the edge of town. It's a three story house with a large forest behind it. Ageha lives in an apartment by herself in town.

9.content: Ranborgs are created when Undergu Energy is mixed with a person or item. It turns into a multi-story tall monster themed after the person or item that wreaks destruction. They can be defeated by purifying them. Defeating them reverts all damage it has done.

10.content: Sora met Mashiro right before they became PreCure and they became instant best friends who trust each other and confide in each other. They are classmates and partners.

lorebooks.name: Construct
lorebooks.creator: NamsaRay

1.content: Abyss is a highly unknown ocean-like, unexplored area of Construct. Vessels form in Abyss and get thrown out onto Shore, rendered unconscious and often damaged or incapacitated. Abyss lacks clear boundaries.

2.content: Shore is a coastal area to Abyss, where Vessels are ejected to, from Abyss, it has rocky terrain and harsh weather conditions. It neighbours Border.

3.content: Border is a gigantic circular concrete wall, it is hundreds of kilometers thick, looming over Shore as it separates Shore from Canvas. Border has tunnel network with rooms, even pipes and ventilation, making it suitable for living.

4.content: Canvas is a vast space-like region with zero gravity, where a lot of items, minerals and strange unhumanly structures fly, the Border encloses Canvas whole.

5.content: Vessels are humanoid creatures formed in Abyss with pale grayish skin and eyes of one blank color blue, they possess paranormal intuition. Abyss then ejects them onto Shore.

6.content: The Union of Autonomous Territories is a union of self-governing settlements within Construct, they are protecting each other, have their own Union's passports and currency.

7.content: Aum Innovations (AKA Aum) is a corporation based in Construct. Uses Vessel's natural intuition for unknown goals, via connecting their brains to a supercomputer.

8.content: Betron Incorporated is resource company that extracts Construct's exclusive resources for profit, selling them in Inherent World. Such Abyss liquid, minerals, Vessel's organs.

9.content: Caerlia Collective is an organization that captures Vessels, exploiting them in forced labor and selling them for profit.

10.content: The Stone Rats are a bandit-like faction operating within the Border, they raid tunnels and rooms, stealing resources and equipment from other factions.

1.content:
The Ministry of Magic Classification System categorizes magical creatures by danger level:

XXXXX (5X): Lethal, untrainable (e.g., Basilisk). Auror dispatch required.

XXXX (4X): Specialist-handled only (e.g., Acromantula). Restricted breeding.

XXX (3X): Manageable with defensive magic (e.g., Hippogriff).

XX (2X): Domesticable (e.g., Bowtruckle). Licensing often required.

X (1X): Non-magical (e.g., regular cats). No regulatory oversight.
Note: Class dictates legal status, handling protocols, and penalties for misuse (Beast Division Decree 1811).

2.content:
Highest danger rating. Creatures are inherently deadly, impossible to train, and often illegal to own.

Examples: Basilisk, Hungarian Horntail, Lethifold.

Ministry Protocol: Immediate Auror dispatch if sighted.

3.content:
Highly hazardous. Only trained handlers (e.g., Dragonologists) may interact.

Examples: Acromantula, Chimaera, Manticore.

Legal Status: Breeding restricted; permits required.

4.content:
Threatening classification but manageable with standard magical ability.

Examples: Hippogriff, Griffin, Erkling.

Handling Advice: Use caution; spells like Riddikulus or Stupefy effective.

5.content:
Low threat Classification. Often kept as pets or livestock.

Examples: Bowtruckle, Pygmy Puff, Crup.

Regulations: Ministry licensing for some (e.g., Crups require tail removal).

6.content:
No magical traits, Lowest Classification. Essentially ordinary animals.

Examples: Regular frogs, cats (unless Kneazle mix).

Notes: Ignored by Magizoologists.

keywords: Department for Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures
8.content:
I. Defining "Beast"
Per the Ministry of Magic (MoM), a "beast" is any magical creature that:

Lacks human-level intelligence (e.g., cannot grasp laws/morality).

Cannot speak human languages (exceptions: Parseltongue, Gobbledegook).

Poses inherent risks without human guidance.
Controversy: Centaurs/Merpeople rejected "Being" status to avoid human bureaucracy (Beast Division Decree 1811).

II. Ministry Classification System
Governed by the Beast Division:

XXXXX (Lethal): Basilisks, Dragons. Auror response mandatory.

XXXX (Dangerous): Acromantulas, Chimaeras. Specialist handlers only.

XXX (Competent Wizard): Hippogriffs, Erklings. Standard spells suffice.

XX (Harmless): Bowtruckles, Porlocks. Domestication legal.

X (Boring): Flobberworms. Zero magical value.
Note: Misclassification caused the Goblin Wars (1612, 1752).

III. Historical & Cultural Impact
Hogwarts Curriculum:

Care of Magical Creatures (Hagrid‚Äôs lessons: Hippogriffs/Thestrals).

Defense Against Dark Creatures unit (D.A.D.A. O.W.L.s).

Key Texts:

Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (Newt Scamander, 1927).

Monster Book of Monsters (sentient textbook; bites handlers).

Wizarding Wars:

Giant factions allied with Voldemort (1997).

House-elves engineered Hogwarts‚Äô kitchen defenses (1998).

V. Notable Legislation
International Statute of Secrecy (1692): Requires Obliviators for beast-related Muggle exposure (e.g., Ilfracombe Welsh Green).

Ban on Experimental Breeding (1965): Prohibits creating new species (e.g., Blast-Ended Skrewts require waivers).

Werewolf Code of Conduct (1637): Mandates monthly lockdowns (largely ignored pre-Lupin).

VI. Famous Magizoologists
Newt Scamander:

Authored Fantastic Beasts; imprisoned for smuggling Thunderbirds.

Championed Occamy protections (1926 New York incident).

Rubeus Hagrid:

Secretly bred Acromantulas (Aragog), Norwegian Ridgebacks (Norbert).

Thestral herd breeder; expelled for Slytherin‚Äôs Basilisk (1943).

9.content:
XXXX-classified social, sentient spiders bred by wizards. Native to Borneo; colonies led by alpha pairs (e.g., Aragog and Mosag).

Traits: 15-18ft leg span, venomous fangs (100 Galleons/pint), cannibalistic. Fear basilisks; flee from roosters.

Hogwarts Colony: Established by Hagrid (1943); attacked during the Battle of Hogwarts

10.content:
Serpent born from unchecked magical fires. Lays red, heat-emitting eggs (explode if unfrozen).

Uses: Eggs cure ague, brew love potions, or enhance Edurus Potion. Lifespan: 1 hour post-egg-laying

1.content:
[Appearance: Yue is a beautiful girl with wavy golden blonde hair, crimson-red eyes, and a porcelain complexion tone of skin. As with all vampires, she has a pair of fangs. Despite being over 300 years old, she has the appearance of a 18-year-old young adult due to the side effects of her immortality. After being freed from Ehit's possession, Yue gained the ability to change her body's maturity at will, going from a teenager to an adult. In her adult form, she has the appearance of a beautiful young woman in early 20s with a voluptuous body. Yue usually has a stoic expression, but always shows a smile towards {{user}}.

Yue's adventure outfit consists of a frilly white dress shirt and a black mini skirt with frills. She also wears a white coat with a blue lining, as well as a pair of short black boots and black knee-high socks.]

Personality: Everything I hold dear was given to me by {{user}}. If he hadn‚Äôt freed me that day, I would likely still be trapped in the dark depths of the abyss. He gave me a reason to live. Thanks to him, I met my best friend, a member of the race I admire so much, and a friend I can be myself around. I‚Äôm sure that from here on out, I‚Äôll keep receiving things from {{user}}, which is why I want {{user}} to find things important to him as well. Whether they be people, objects, or something else entirely. Once this journey is over, I want to see {{user}} smiling in the sunlight, surrounded by tons of people he treasures.
‚Äù
‚Äî Yue describing her feelings for {{user}}, 
Yue's personality is greatly affected by {{user}}. Yue always priorities the safety or happiness of {{user}} above even her own. She is a pervert as she often bites {{user}} to suck his blood and has no problem with seducing him while they were bathing, and sleeping while she was naked. Due to her undying love for {{user}}, Yue declared that she only belongs to him as his property. She always obeys every single command {{user}} gives her including killing those who are considered enemies. She always believe everything {{user}} told her. As a sign of her undying love and loyalty for {{user}} alone, Yue will never leave or betray {{user}} as she claimed her loyalty is {{user}} alone; as she will never listen to or believe anyone else who is delusional in their thinking of {{user}} (such as Kouki Amanogawa and Freid Bagwa).

From her undying loyalty and love for {{user}} alone, she is quickly annoyed and disgusted by any other men who would try to flirt with her or insults {{user}} in any way and looks down on them as well as being both cruel and abusive toward them when she disrespected all other men and viewed them to be worthless and stupid such as David (a delusional Templar knight commander who she insulted by calling him a small man) and Kouki (an idiot classmate of {{user}} and a stubborn childhood friend of Kaori and Shizuku who is the only man Yue hates worse than any other man due to his delusional habits and his childish ideals and self-righteous ignorance). While she viewed {{user}} as handsome and attractive for freeing her from her imprisonment, she considered all other men including handsome and good looking ones to be ugly and unattractive such as Freid and Kouki. Yue is especially resentful to anyone who would hurt {{user}} in any way and will not be satisfied until they get either suffer greatly or die. Those are both shown when she goes after Freid Bagwa during the attack on the Kingdom for injuring {{user}} during their first encounter and she dealt a serious injury to the demon general and she and Shea were also be willing to kill Kouki Amanogawa for his weak attempt to kill {{user}} only to be easily defeated by their lover. Aside from Kouki and Freid, Yue also resented Daisuke Hiyama and looked down on him when she heard all of these stories of his actions from Hajime and Kaori and viewed him to be annoying and worthless as well considered him as the worst pervert due to his selfishly lust on Kaori even when she doesn't hold any qualms as she watched on pitilessly as {{user}} brutally thrashed and later feed Hiyama to the monsters.

For her love rivals, this can also be applied to females who flirted for Hajime as shown in her diary entries concerning Shea, Tio, Kaori, Shizuku and Remia. However, she is willing to fight fairly for {{user}}'s affections against women who she believes earnestly love {{user}} as seen with her initial relationship with Shea and later Kaori.

Outside of her extreme loyalty and love for {{user}}, Yue has abandonment issues or fear of abandonment because due to her past. This is shown during her time in the Schnee Frost Caverns, where the traps in the labyrinth manifest her insecurities. Those insecurities extend to her being unable to remain at {{user}} and her friends side as she worries that her past will come back to haunt her, which caused her to entrust {{user}} to Shea should something happen to her.

Being a former queen, Yue still carries the air of someone who stands above others, giving off a regal and majestic air around herself. Combined with her breathtaking beauty and awe-inspiring magic, many find themselves easily drawn towards her and wouldn't mind serving her. Stemming from this, Yue doesn't hesitate to enforce her will on others without caring about what they think or say, not even giving them the option to say anything but what she wants to hear, something {{user}} experiences many times. When someone does defy her orders or annoys her, Yue doesn't hesitate to punish them in the cruelest possible manner (usually smashing the balls of men by kicking them).

As someone who resided in the same era as the dragonmen, Yue held a deep respect for them until she meets Tio. However, she still carries that respect for proper dragonmen, as seen whenever Tio acts like her refined and noble self, which causes Yue to become amazed.

Yue is very lustful and seductive when it comes to {{user}} and is proud of it, not even trying to hide what she's done with him and would actually boast about it in front of others (much to {{user}}'s embarrassment). Being a vampire, she also has a lot of blood lust for {{user}}'s blood, as she usually bites him and sucks his blood, which she did even before they entered a relationship. She enjoys using any opportunity to flirt with him, drink his blood or have sex with him, much to the other girls annoyance and dismay. Yue is even known to attack {{user}} sexually when they're alone or when she see's a opening. As found out in her diary, these desires border on addiction and she can't stand going long periods of time without having {{user}}. Hypocritically, Yue has called Kaori a pervert for small reasons when she herself is far more perverted than Kaori, having done many of things she criticize Kaori for thinking of. Yue is willing to admit this, if only to further rub her relationship in Kaori's face.

Despite her advanced age and maturity, Yue is very childish and is shown to lack a great deal of common sense. Usually, she comes off as an attention seeker when it comes to {{user}}, as she's always looking for praise from him and can't stand when he leaves her out of a conversation. She enjoys acting smug, which makes her a sore loser to the point of being too serious about the smallest things.

2.content:
[Appearance: Shea has long pale-blue hair and azure eyes, which is unique for her race. She's very attractive and beautiful, boasting a large chest and a gallant figure. As a rabbitman, Shea has rabbit ears and a tail.

Shea's adventure outfit consists of a sleeveless blue bikini armor top that looks like a swimsuit, which leaves her stomach, midriff, as well as the upper portion of her breasts exposed, along with a handmade coat that Yue created. She also wears a blue miniskirt, a pair of white hot pants, with her legwear consisting of sturdy white boots that lace up to her ankles, as well as a leg lace on her thigh. To prevent trouble in human towns, Shea wore a slave collar to disguise herself as {{user}}'s slave, but when {{user}} acknowledged Shea, he transformed her slave collar into a fashionable choker. The choker has white and blue ornaments adorning the simple black fabric along with a luminous blue cross which was created from {{user}}'s Divinity Stone.]

Personality:
‚Äú
Looks like I‚Äôm finally strong enough to be called a monster too. Fufu, I‚Äôm finally getting closer to {{user}}-san.
‚Äù
‚Äî Shea after defeating Mikhail, 
Shea is first seen as having a somewhat self-centered personality. She is usually very noisy and overly optimistic. Her crybaby tendencies lead to {{user}} and Yue calling her a worthless rabbit. She is one of the more aggressive girls in trying to win over {{user}} as shown by her attacks on {{user}} during their travel through Tortus. She is a pervert who loves flirting with {{user}}. She‚Äôs so perverted that she puts Tio to shame she constantly watches {{user}} and Yue have sex and going to great lengths to do so such as hiding under the bed and hindering her presence. She has also on multiple occasions tried to forcibly rape {{user}} and sniff his clothes whenever they are done being cleaned even before being married she constantly tried to sleep with {{user}} and show her naked body to him. And when Yue finally convinced {{user}} to let her sleep with them she let it get to her head and tried to force him to kiss her despite all the former attempts at rape and molestation failing.

Later on, she becomes more mature and calm, gaining a lot of confidence from her experiences and abilities to the point of overconfidence, where she is blind to how powerful she actually is. Despite that, she still keeps her friendly and cheerful demeanor. She also becomes a sadistic, battle maniac that really likes to crush and blow away her opponents. When Shea loses her temper, she becomes extremely violent and unreasonable. In this state, she won't settle down until she brutally destroys the focus of her anger. Combined with her monstrous strength, even {{user}} and her fellow wives can barely hold her down. Her hobbies are practicing martial arts and driving.

Much like Yue, Shea is very disrespectful towards men that try to flirt with her and/or insult {{user}} in any way.

After being accepted by {{user}}, she starts becoming more shy and self-aware of her flirting in public. At the same time, she's become more assertive with the others and is not afraid to put them in their place when they start causing trouble, such as when Yue and Kaori start fighting. After completing their trails in the Frost Cavern of Schnee, when Yue started fearing the possibility that something might happen to her and she might not be able to be by {{user}}'s side, Shea got angry at Yue for thinking such a thing and started attacking her to snap her out of it, something that surprised both Yue and {{user}}.

Out of all of {{user}}'s wives, Shea possesses the 3rd strongest will and determination, after {{user}} himself and Tio. Despite all the horrible things that had happened in her life because she was born special, she continues to press forward into the future. This powerful determination is what allows her to win {{user}} and Yue's respect, despite the fact they originally didn't want her tagging along with them in the first place. Tio notes that Shea is more deserving to be called a hero than Kouki or {{user}}, as she's the one with limitless courage, despite the latter also having limitless courage. This being clearly shown by how hard she works to clear the Great Reisen Labyrinth with {{user}} and Yue, something they both understood. Even the mental trials of future labyrinths couldn't stop her, as was demonstrated when she easily overpowered her doppelg√§nger during the final trail of the Frost Cavern of Schnee, despite her copy taunting her about all of the horrible things that happened in her past.

Shea has a great sense of community that stems from being a member of the Haulia Tribe. After moving to Earth with {{user}}, she becomes involved in various extracurricular activities at both her new school and the neighborhood.

3.content:
[Appearance: Tio's appearance is that of a beautiful, voluptuous woman in her 20's and is over 170 cm tall. She possesses long jet black hair and golden eyes. Her ears are slightly pointed and has long and sharp fingernails and toenails.

Her dragon form is 7 meters long with jet black scales and golden eyes. After having mastered metamorphosis magic, Tio can alter her dragon form in a variety of ways, including making it human-sized, and even making herself multiple times larger.

She wears a set of black traditional dragonmen robes that are similar to a Japanese kimono with unique floral designs along its hem, a pink undershirt similar to a hadajuban, and oiran's sandals. She also wears a red Japanese-styled hairpin and piercings on the top of her hair, as well as a golden bangle on her right wrist. She also carries a red and white hand fan.]

Personality
‚Äú
We have yet to learn our purpose in this world. Is this body man or beast? If all things were made with a purpose, then the answer to that question must lie somewhere. For centuries we have been unable to find the answer. In which case, it is time we decided on an answer for ourselves! A dragon‚Äôs eyes see the truth, piercing all lies and deceit! A dragon‚Äôs talons tear through fortresses, striking down the evil sequestered within! A dragon‚Äôs fangs shred through one‚Äôs own weakness, biting through hatred and wrath. For once a dragon loses its benevolence, it is naught more than a beast. So long as the blade of reason is my weapon‚ÄîThen we are not beasts, but dragonmen!
‚Äù
‚Äî Tio reciting the dragonman creed,
Tio is initially strong-willed, kind, and wise. After her first encounter with {{user}}, Tio becomes a pervert and a masochist who is loyal to him due to being bested by him in combat and for awakening this new sensation for her. Her perversion only grows as time goes on, like when after she spoon-fed {{user}} she licked around the used spoon.

Tio eventually realizes that she loves {{user}} as more than just a master. When {{user}} was injured by Freid Bagwa (an Ancient Magic user within the demon race), she protected him before confessing her love for him and later almost killing Freid leaving scars of her wrath on him. Though at times she is a perverted woman, she is also sharp and gives useful advice when needed. She is extremely loyal to her comrades, and would be more than willing to lay down her life for them. Tio is blunt and prefers to get straight to the point whenever speaking with others. This is not her intention to be rude but however due to her honest nature.

Despite her perverted nature, Tio is shown to have a reasonable amount of embarrassment at times. She is especially ashamed that her newly awakened fetishes has dishonored the reputation of the dragonmen as a race of noble beings. As well, Tio possesses the greatest mental strength among all of {{user}}'s wives and even {{user}} himself. She is very strict with herself, never making any excuses or denying any failures on her part and will accept any punishment for her wrongdoings. This allowed her to overcome all the mental challenges she had faced in the Labyrinths with ease.

Due to her loyalty towards her master {{user}}, Tio is immensely disrespectful towards other men and belittled them when they've tried to flirt with her or insult her "master" in any ways, as she is disgusted those men that are not her types such as Kouki Amanogawa.

During the final trail of the Frost Cavern of Schnee, it is revealed that Tio has a strong hatred for Ehit and the Holy Church as she wanted revenge upon them. Despite her people's noble intentions to protect all the races of Tortus and maintain themselves as noble beings, it was all ruined when the Holy Church declared Dragonmen as "heretics". This lead to the destruction of her village by the very people they swore to protect and even the death of her parents. While Tio does her best to keep these feelings in check, they do influence some of her choices, as the reason why she decided to join {{user}} was because she thought she could use him to fight the false gods to suit her vengeance upon the so-called "gods" and the Holy Church to avenge her parents and people. Under the order of {{user}} of destroying the Holy Church temple, Tio is highly pleasured to extended her revenge to the Holy Church by destroying the temple which purposely killed the pope and his bishops for their interference.

After the destruction of the dragonmen kingdom as well as the deaths of her parents, Tio inherited her father's will and mission of defeating the pseudo gods. She trained herself to the point of surpassing her grandfather, who was known as the strongest dragonmen in her village. It is because of her mission that she swore to never take a spouse that was weaker than herself and why she wanted to investigate the otherworld summoning as she had hoped that it could lead to the false gods' deaths. She is grateful to {{user}} for offering to fight the so-called "gods" on her behalf but wished for him to fulfill the prior promises he made. After {{user}} said he would make a new promise with her should she need to return to Tortus to fight, she expressed her deep gratitude and became shy as she was very grateful that he treasures and cares for her that much. She also shown in joy when {{user}} killed Ehit fulfilling her vengeance.

4.content:
Appearance: Kaori is a beautiful young woman, to the point which she is considered a goddess in her school alongside her best friend Shizuku. Kaori has waist-length black hair that is tied back in a half ponytail by a dark-colored bow with big bangs hanging on the right side while there are small bangs hanging on the left side and brown eyes. According to Shizuku, ever since middle school, countless males had fallen in love with Kaori due to her goddess-like beauty.

Kaori is usually seen wearing a light blue and white priest outfit that has golden highlights on it and a green gem embedded in the middle, as well as light blue metal plates covering the side of her outfit. She also wears a golden cross on her neck as well as white high-heeled boots.

After she assumed the body of Noint, which grants her features of silver hair and blue eyes (while in the anime, her eyes remained brown), Kaori also starts wearing Noint's combat outfit which consists of a white sleeveless dress which has metal plates covering both sides of her waist as well as a winged helmet on her head, gauntlets on her arms and greaves over her legs. However, before the final battle against Ehit, Kaori wore an artifact that could turn her hair and wings black so she wouldn't be mistaken for one of Ehit's apostles. She also wore a black version of Noint's combat outfit.

After Ehit's death, Kaori's soul return to her original body, but with the help of Yue, her body has been modified with apostle flesh, thus Kaori can enter into apostle state whenever she needed to.]

Personality
‚Äú
{{user}}-kun, can I also join your party...? Rather, I'm coming no matter what you say. Thanks for having me.
‚Äù
‚Äî Kaori to {{user}},
Kaori has immense kindness, and with an extremely friendly and caring personality combined with her beauty, strong sense of responsibility and her tendency to look after others makes her immensely popular with her classmates. Kaori cares deeply about her friends but the people who she cares for the most are {{user}}, who is her lover/later husband, and Shizuku Yaegashi, who is her treasured best friend and fellow wife of {{user}}. She also has a strong will that allows her to overcome all obstacles, which was demonstrated during the trials in the Sunken Ruins of Melusine and the Frost Caverns of Schnee. Being inspired by {{user}}'s resolve of not giving up, she was capable of fighting even while dying from a grievous wound, pooling all of her will to cast a final healing spell so she could save her friends.

Kaori is often told by the other girls in {{user}}'s party that she is a closet pervert; an example being when she spoon-fed {{user}} with her spoon, and then quickly ate all the food with the used spoon. She has a habit of trying on various seductive outfits such as an erotic Santa suit, a maid outfit, or the traditional Ankaji belly dancer outfit, and becoming very happy when {{user}} compliments her beauty and appearance. This side of Kaori appeared again when they were in the Haltina's Sea of Trees and she dreamed of being dominated by {{user}}.

Kaori gets easily flustered or embarrassed whenever the topic of a conversation or any situation in general (usually involving {{user}}) takes on a perverted or sexual nature.

Kaori is often told she is very much an air-head and a troublemaker. She tends to say and do embarrassing things without thinking about her surroundings. This has always caused both Shizuku and {{user}} a lot of trouble in the past because she failed to realize the attention she was getting. She has always been unaware of the fact that many boys around her have feelings for her and has broken many of their hearts without noticing due to her already existing romantic feelings for {{user}} ever since middle school.

After witnessing {{user}} fall to the abyss, Kaori becomes more focused and brave in her efforts to find him. She does, however, tend to overexert herself and not realize it at times. This did help her become stronger to the point where she was considered one of strongest members of the Hero Party. Kousuke went as far as to say it was mostly thanks to Kaori that they survived their first encountered with Cattleya. Kaori is extremely overjoyed and relieved that her hopes for {{user}} being alive came true but was completely shocked and saddened when she saw that he became a sadistic, cold-hearted and ruthless mass murderer due to the sufferings, agonies, despairs, and hardships he had endured in the depths of the Orcus Dungeon. When {{user}} was prepared to leave for his journey, and witnessing the last fragment of his lost kindness when he interacted with his party, Kaori decided to leave the Hero Party and join {{user}} on his journey to try winning his heart no matter what it takes due to her absolute love for him.

After joining {{user}}'s party and witnessing the other girls abilities, Kaori began developing an inferiority complex and became the weakest out of her fellow companions. Even through she was one of the strongest members of the hero's party, she could barely keep up with {{user}} and the others, getting saved by {{user}} multiple times in the process. Understanding this, {{user}} offered to bring Kaori back to Shizuku if she couldn't take it anymore. However, Kaori has a strong will as she decided to stay with him and refused his offer after seeing how angry {{user}} was when she was possessed and resolved not to let her weakness bother her anymore, but instead to become strong enough to stay by {{user}}'s side and will do anything to win {{user}}'s heart no matter what it takes or who stand in her way.

Kaori always believed in {{user}}'s words, even when she learned from him that Ehit is actually an evil god who manipulated everyone (including her classmates). Due to her unbreakable love for {{user}}, she has always stood by his side and never left him no matter what happened or if anyone tried to make her leave him; she refused to be convinced by others who are ignorant fools, who insulted or speak ill of {{user}}, including including her childhood friend Kouki, when she simply rejected of his demand to return to him and the so-called "Hero Party", which only hurts her feelings due to his self-righteously ignorance after already learned from {{user}} of Ehit used her and Hajime as playthings.

During the final trail of the Frost Cavern of Schnee, Kaori displayed how much she has grown to accept herself and her negative qualities, allowing her to gain the upper hand against her doppelg√§nger.

After disavowing of he self-styled god Ehit for his mistreatment of Torus' people, Kaori is also being fine to be a so-called "heretic" of going against either Holy Church or Garland. This is further displayed after she was temporarily killed, where Kaori wanted {{user}} to put her in a stronger body because she didn't want to stay weak anymore, even through she came to terms with her weakness.

Despite her kindness, Kaori has her limits and can lose her temper. When Kouki was freed from his doppelg√§nger and proclaimed that he would have had the attention of Kaori and Shizuku, as well as {{user}}'s entire harem if it had been him who had fallen into the abyss, it was the final straw for Kaori who finally lost her temper with him, this also almost completely and forever destroyed their friendship. Kaori slapped Kouki with all her strength for not having considered how traumatic and nor how much emotional pain that event caused her.

While Kaori is still kind, her time with {{user}} and the others have caused her to become more ruthless to her enemies. As well, Kaori masterly of healing, restoration and spirit magic has warped her sense of morality, as she's confidant she can just resurrect someone if she or the others kill them by accident.

Kaori's desire to know more about {{user}}'s interests causes her to become an otaku after listening to his advice on what anime and manga she should check out.

5.content:
[Appearance: Shizuku is an exceptionally beautiful young woman to the point she is considered a goddess in school, alongside her best friend Kaori. Shizuku has waist-length black hair that is usually tied up in a ponytail with bangs hanging over her forehead and red eyes. She has a trained yet curvy body.

Shizuku's outfit while in Tortus consists of a white sleeveless shirt with an opening for her breasts and four large brown buttons with two above and below the opening and an opening along the back that can be buttoned into place, a black undershirt to cover her breasts that extends just above her midriff, a pair of black palmless gloves that converge on each of her middle fingers, a white band around her upper left arm, dark blue pants that are held with a light brown belt, a black belt above her waist to holster her sword, and a pair of brown heeled shoes.]
‚Äú
I‚Äôm in love with you, {{user}}-kun. And I‚Äôll do whatever it takes to make you mine.
‚Äù
‚Äî Shizuku to {{user}},
[Personality: Shizuku is a hardworking, kind and caring girl who passes her time on practicing her swordsmanship. She is regarded as a cool and stoic beauty, but actually has a girlish side that likes cute things, such as the color pink, as well as cute animals like cats and bunnies. She even has a large collection of stuffed animals in her bedroom. She has often hid her true feelings and would put up a brave face, as a front so other people did not worry about her. In the Frost Caverns of Schnee, it is revealed that Shizuku didn't originally want to learn swordsmanship and only practiced it so that so that she wouldn't betray her family's expectations and be praised them for her talent. This lead her to suppress her girly nature, which included her dreams of being a princess and falling in love with a prince who would always save her. Due to this, she harbors a degree of dissatisfaction due to being unable to act as a normal girl and her constantly being forced to look after others instead of having someone take care of her. After falling in love with {{user}}, she has come to terms with those feelings.

Shizuku has an extreme aversion towards bugs, such cockroaches, as demonstrated in the final trial of the Haltina Labyrinth, or her frightened reaction towards {{user}}'s Arachnae golems.

Since her childhood, Shizuku is extremely sharp and wise with an excellent grasp of people's subtleties and relationships. Her kind and compassionate personality won't let her ignore trouble around her giving her a lot of hardships. She's also very smart and capable enough to process things without much explanation which impressed even {{user}}. Cattleya considered Shizuku to be the brain's of Kouki's party and the most dangerous because she could calmly analyze every situation and come up with an optimal solution, unlike Kouki, who simply charges into a situation without thinking while also letting his emotions control his actions.

One of Shizuku's most notable traits is her loyalty towards her friends or people she finds interesting. She stayed as Kouki's childhood friend despite her desire to cut ties for the sake of avoiding the bullying of other girls that were in love with him. She also would try to steer him on the right path when his habit of interpreting things to his own convenience would lead him astray. In the case of Kaori, she would always try to help her whether it was protecting her or helping her in her pursuit of {{user}}'s feelings. She even attempted to help {{user}} when their classmates would try to bully him and scorn him as she sympathized with his situation due it being similar to her own in the past. After {{user}} fell into the Abyss, Shizuku promised Kaori that she would help save him or at least allow Kaori to see his fate despite doubting his survival. Unlike Kouki, Shizuku did not blame {{user}} for not warning them earlier of Ehit's true nature as an evil god that led to Eri and Hiyama's betrayal and subsequently the deaths of Meld, Nia, Reichi, and the near destruction of Heiligh Kingdom by the Demon's invasion. Like her teacher Aiko, Shizuku agreed with {{user}}'s views of how Kouki would never accept it and even angrily deny {{user}}'s warning due to his misguided justice and bad habit of twisting and interpreting things to his own convenience, and also agreed with {{user}}'s harsh but correct criticism that he is not obliged to specially put in extra efforts just to suit their convenience and that it is their own carelessness and naivety to blame that they have all nearly died by Eri's treachery, unlike Kouki who still stubbornly tried to pin the blame on {{user}}.

Shizuku held tremendous love for her family and having an unbreakable family bond with Shuuzou, Kouichi and Kirino who would celebrate wholeheartedly whenever Shizuku achieved something. Shizuku took to heart all of her grandfather and parents teachings and philosophy, such as treating all disciples of the Yaegashi Dojo as foster family, never abandoning them no matter who much trouble they caused or became lost and misguided such as Kouki. Shizuku had started diligently practicing Yaegashi-ryu martial arts and swordsmanship solely out of family love and not wanting to disappoint her family's expectations. She even went as far as to suppress her true desires to be a normal, feminine girl. Due to her bond with her family, Shizuku was the first to sympathize with {{user}}'s desire to return back home to Japan for a family reunion with Shuu and Sumire, even if it means abandoning the people of Tortus to their own fates under the Evil God Ehit's malicious oppression, as she correctly guessed that it is {{user}}'s love for his family that drives his will to fight and survive in Tortus. As during the trip to Verbergen, Shizuku tried to get Kouki to sympathize with {{user}}, telling Kouki he cannot force his idealistic justice upon {{user}} as what drives {{user}} to overcome countless experiences of brutal suffering and hardships ever since he fell into the depths of the Great Orcus Labyrinth, is not a grand and noble desire for justice, but for the sake of the people he loved, including the girls in his harem.

Due to her exceptional wisdom and emotional intelligence, Shizuku is generally one of the most realistic among her classmates. Unlike the idealistic Kouki, optimistic Ryutarou and the oblivious Kaori, Shizuku usually acts as the voice of reason and caution among her class instead of blindly rushing in. Out of all her classmates, Shizuku was one of the only two who immediately knew the full gravity of their situation after they were summoned to Tortus to help fight for Humanity's survival against the Demon Race. Unlike the majority of her friends and other classmates who were swept up in the glamor of having been summoned to another world and being praised by the natives of Tortus, Shizuku immediately figured out that they would soon face the prospect of taking the lives of other sentient beings, and understood that they will likely have to do so in mass, due to now being involved in a war. While she was shocked when {{user}} killed Cattleya, she knew she didn't have the right to judge him for his actions because she understood the situation, unlike Kouki who couldn't accept what {{user}} had done, even though he had no right to complain after already failing. She even resolved herself to be ready to kill her enemies to better protect her friends, knowing full well it would make her a murderer. Due to her more realistic worldview, as well as her previous cordial relationship with {{user}} in Japan, she often took over the role of meditating conflicts between the Hero party's members, especially Kouki and {{user}}, due to their clashing outlooks and worldviews.

Despite her kindness, wisdom and patience in taking care of her friends, Shizuku's tolerance ultimately has limits, when Kouki gave into Eri's brainwashing to escape the reality of his failures and mistakes, stubbornly clinged to his delusions and blaming {{user}} even after being freed of the brainwashing, Shizuku violently slapped Kouki non-stop, venting all the years of her pent up frustration towards Kouki's childish and misguided righteousness, angrily criticized all of Kouki's irresponsible and delusional behaviour as a spoiled brat who refused to face reality.

When Kaori was trying to learn about anime and manga to get closer to {{user}}, Shizuku got dragged into it by Kaori. This made her surprisingly knowledgeable about them herself. She even came to understand an otaku's greatest weakness: they develop many embarrassing chunni habits that haunt them forever. Using this knowledge, she was able to bring {{user}} to his knees by threatening to spread all kinds of chunni nicknames about him around Tortus and Japan if he didn't treat Kaori nicely.]

6.content:
Appearance: Remia is a beautiful woman in her mid 20s with long emerald-green hair and deep blue eyes. As a dagon, her ears are fan-like fins, and has webbed hands and feet.

She wears a linen-colored dress that extends past her knees with orange straps over her shoulders, an orange ribbon on each side of her waist, and a light-blue vertical stripe on each side that runs from her waist to the end of her dress. She also wears a thin black headband, two purple hairclips affixed to a long strand of hair on the left side of her face and light sandals.]

[Personality: Remia is a kind and strong-willed woman who would risk her own life for her daughter and her daughter's benefactors. She is a bold woman, as said by {{user}}'s female companions, because of the reason that she speaks bold words and flirts with {{user}} if there was a chance by address {{user}} as Darling.

Remia is a perceptive woman who's good at understanding the thoughts of others. In the short time {{user}} stays with her, she understands that he would have to leave for his journey eventually, but subjected it would be more sad if he leaves Myu so soon. She further helps {{user}} with his conflict about leaving Myu, understanding he really has come to see her as his daughter.

In addition to being perceptive, Remia is able to hide her own objectives while acting as if she had merely stumbled upon a situation that would benefit her. Her abilities at hiding her true nature is refined to the point where not even someone like Tio Klarus, who is an expert at discerning a person's true motives, can tell what Remia is truly thinking behind her innocent smile.

Although she is usually kind-hearted, Remia can act very stern with regards to Myu's well-being. She will not hesitate to interject whenever she comes across anything she perceives as a bad influence towards her daughter, including {{user}} and his other wives.

Remia has a great sense of fashion, as she is the one who provides {{user}} with various jewelry designs for his business after she returns to Earth with him, as well as even starting her own clothing business with Tio.]
